message.content: {"id": "42225", "title": "Can't assign command to Ctrl+Backspace", "description": "I am unable to assign any command to the Ctrl+Backspace key combination. When I try to reassign the key via the key preference page, it wrongly displays Ctrl+Del when I press Ctrl+Backspace. I am using a Swiss German keyboard and Swiss German locale.", "OB": "The expected behavior is that pressing Ctrl+Backspace should delete the previous word.", "EB": "Instead, the keybinding manager incorrectly interprets Ctrl+Backspace as Ctrl+Del and deletes the next word.", "SR": "The issue seems to be with the keybinding manager, which is not recognizing Ctrl+Backspace correctly with my specific keyboard and locale settings."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '42225', 'title': "Bug 42225Can't assign command to Ctrl+Backspace", 'description': "Bug 42225Can't assign command to Ctrl+Backspace ", 'OB': '', 'EB': 'I20030827Out of the box Ctrl+Backspace should delete the previous word. ', 'SR': 'Somehow the keybinding manager thinks this is Ctrl+Del and deletes the next word.If I try to reassing the key via key pref page it displays Ctrl+Del when I pressCtrl+Backspace.I have a Swiss German Keyboard using Swiss German Locale. '}
